text: Martín Esteban Pando (26 December 1934 – 7 May 2021) was an Argentine footballer. He played as a forward. Pando started playing in 1955 at Platense in Buenos Aires before moving to Argentinos Juniors in 1958 and then River Plate in 1962. In total he played 242 league matches and scored 37 goals in the Argentine league. Pando also played for the Argentina national team in two 1962 FIFA World Cup.
